name: Wolfy
description:
Wolfy is a game about a wolf that wants to become a dog. The action takes place on a crazy pasture where sheeps gather arround to feed themselves with grass. Unfortunetly, they don't know when to stop, so they can become chunky.

Your task is to make use of fat sheeps, feed all others, survive and keep away bad wolves!

Controls:

A,W,S,D - Move

J - Play/Bark (Bark on sheeps, meat or grey wolves)

ESC - pause/back/exit

R - restarts the game

S (on splash screen) - see credits

Additional instructions:

-Bark on the grey wolf to kill him

-When rolling a sheep to:

North East - Get 3 sheeps

South East - Get wool (collect 5 wool for collar, cap or jeans!)

South West - To get a meat. You have to eat so You don't die from hunger (light blue bar above Your head, bark to eat it)

North South - Sacrifical altar, gain a curse or a bonus!

-Bonuses:

Superdog! - Become a hero! You can kill wolves just by running into them or barking once. You push sheeps super fast! Plus, You look cool

Fertilizer - sheep grows extra fast for few seconds

Sheep rain - many sheeps fall from sky

Heal - restore Your HP

-Curses:

Grass plague - Half of grass dies

Slowness - You're slower for some time

Blind - You've a small vision radius

Gods are unpleased - get a small meat :/ only

This game is made by MightyPancake
